title: ECR4Kids Leaf Floor Seat, Rocker Chair, Sage/Grey, 6-Piece
features: Scoop Floor Seat: Create collaborative environments with this set of 6 plastic scoop seats; great flexible seating options for the classroom, daycare, preschool, playroom, and home
Child-Sized: Furniture fit for children provides a comfortable and safe learning environment to help develop physical, cognitive and social skills while promoting independence and creativity
Lightweight and Portable: Durable rocking chairs are comfortable and designed for movement throughout the day while making seated tasks more engaging; inspire focused learning in any environment
Certified Safe: Classroom seats are GREENGUARD [GOLD] Certified for low VOCs and CPSIA compliant; feature rounded edges for safety
Product Dimensions: Kids scoop rocker chairs measure 15.5” W x 8.8” D x 14.25” H each; the one-piece design comes fully assembled with no hardware to maintain
description: Provide a fun and cozy seating option for little ones to read and relax indoors or out with ECR4Kids Leaf Floor Seat. The 6-piece alternative seating set makes it easy to implement flexible seating, create interactive learning circles, or a quiet reading nook in a library or school. Creating dynamic learning environments in the classroom encourages collaboration, and inspires creativity, critical thinking, and communication between students. The playful scoop seat design is intended for use on the floor to provide a comfortable place to read, play video games, watching tv, relax, enjoy a snack, or do other seated activities. Active seating is ideal for individuals with restlessness, ADHD, ASD, or sensory sensitivities. Little ones can sit and rock while enjoying their favorite book in the kids’ reading chair, increasing blood flow to the body and brain aiding concentration without distracting others nearby. Make the most of your space with lightweight and versatile seating that adults and children can arrange and rearrange to meet the classroom’s learning needs. The one-piece molded seat comes fully assembled and is constructed with heavy-duty plastic. When learning time is over, nest scoop chairs in a corner saving valuable floor space.
